body_html:
A quick search seems to indicate that the other options, GDR and VERBS are for these two contrib packages:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/gdr

Maybe we should link to these on the install/sources page? @RainbowZephyr, it could be relatively straight forward, care to send a PR?

body:
A quick search seems to indicate that the other options,  GDR and VERBS are for these two contrib packages:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/verbs
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/gdr

Maybe we should link to these on the install/sources page? @RainbowZephyr, it could be relatively straight forward, care to send a PR?
